title: (x) Russian Constructivist typefaces - various {gang}
content:
hello there. i was wondering if anyone knew of any typefaces similar to the radio flat sample i have below that emulate the style of the russian contructivist movement. thanks.   
   
xo   
davy   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123023204im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/41965.jpg)
author: david_fung

comments.content:
I like [Boris Dworschak](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123023204/http:/www.borisdworschak.de/)s ' [Partisan East](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123023204/http:/www.borisdworschak.de/partisan.html)', distributed by ' [Stereo Type Haus](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123023204/http:/www.stereotypehaus.com/)'..   
 [http://www.stereotypehaus.com/catalog/product\_info.php/cPath/23/products\_id/51?osCsid=464e74f0b8eec72a7e2285552f5e0af6](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123023204/http:/www.stereotypehaus.com/catalog/product_info.php/cPath/23/products_id/51?osCsid=464e74f0b8eec72a7e2285552f5e0af6)   
   
_( But, I am pretty sure that there are many others, 'simulating' that kind of look and feel.. )_

Some more nice ones, thanks to the fabulous 'Typophile Archives' and due to lovely cross referencing within these threads.: ' [Dimitri](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123023204/http:/www.typonauten.de/eng/typoshop/dimitri.htm)', ' [Aleksei](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123023204/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f_id=413&dw=98)', ' [QuadratGrotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123023204/http:/www.paratype.com/default.asp?page=/library/newstyles.asp?fontcode=PT_QDR)'..
thanks yves and david.. i totally forgot about east bloc. xo
